code: import{cartActionTypes}from"./cart.types";export var setToggleMenu=function setToggleMenu(){return{type:"SET_TOGGLE"};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.ADD_ITEMS,payload:item};};export var clearItemsFromCart=function clearItemsFromCart(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.CLEAR_ITEMS_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var removeCartItems=function removeCartItems(item){return{type:cartActionTypes.REMOVE_ITEMS,payload:item};};
